titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Surey demoniack as no impostor, or, A reply to a certain pamphlet publish'd by Mr. Zach. Taylor, called, The Surey impostor with a further clearing and confirming of the truth as to Richard Dugdale's case and cure / by T.J. ... ; to which is annexed a brief narrative of the Surey demoniack, drawn up by the same author ...
titleStmt.author: Jollie, Thomas, 1629-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nevill Simmons ... and sold by G. Conyers ...,

notesStmt.note: The Surey demoniac or imposter is Richard Dugdale.
Attributed to T. Jolly. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
